title: Jots
author: Julien Avezou
excerpt: Welcome to Jots, the developer-focused journaling app to accelerate your goals as a developer. Think of jots as your second brain. Whether you're working towards your next promotion or looking to improve your technical skills, use Jots to track your progress, reflect, and take action. As early adopters, access all our features today for free. We have an ambitious roadmap ahead. So join our community and signup now to start your own journaling journey and accelerate your expertise.

html:
Unlock the benefits of journaling to become a better dev.

•0 reviews•

254 followers

Welcome to Jots, the developer-focused journaling app to accelerate your goals as a developer. Think of jots as your second brain. Whether you're working towards your next promotion or looking to improve your technical skills, use Jots to track your progress, reflect, and take action. As early adopters, access all our features today for free. We have an ambitious roadmap ahead. So join our community and signup now to start your own journaling journey and accelerate your expertise.
